page.title: 02Chilren's Games.
page.content: {CHILDREN'S GAMES. {HEADS & VOLLEYS}is a game for 3 or more players where one stands in goal with the others staying outside. One of the outside players kicks the ball in the air and the others try to score without the ball touching the ground - {Tariq.} {UPPY-UPPY}is game where one player has to catch the others who run around. Players are only 'safe' when they stand on something which is above ground level. You can remain 'safe' for 10 seconds. If you are caught, you then become the catcher -{Adam.} {KINGY}involves all players except one making a circle. The one in the middle has to roll a ball through the legs of the other in order to change places with them -{Vaishali.} {E GROUP - ST. JAMES' SCHOOL, ASHTON.
